Description:
PRICE, POSITION AND POSSIBILITIES!
Sitting neatly on approx 599m2 of land in popular Clifton Springs & only a short distance from local beaches, The Dell and Clifton Springs golf club is this comfortable well designed family home. Offering a spacious living area and 3 bedrooms, all with built in robes including the Master bedroom, this delightful home has space for all the family! Taking pride of the home is the functional well appointed, updated kitchen & spacious dining area with access to the undercover verandah leading to a fantastic outdoor entertaining space at the rear of the home. Ideal for the home handy man is the double garage and garden shed at the end of the lengthy driveway, perfect for storing the boat/caravan etc. This lovely home is perfectly situated with easy access to Geelong CBD and all that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. A prime investment opportunity!

Description:
Easy Family Living With Spacious Backyard!
Whether you're dreaming of owning your first home, searching for a terrific investment property, or simply looking for a great place to raise a family, this home is the one for you!
Just three doors down from the local park and playground, this location couldn't be better for young families. Public transport is a short stroll away, along with access to the Bellarine Rail Trail. Easy access to Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub, and the Leopold Library puts the practical elements in place. A short drive will find you at the expansive Gateway Plaza, while the Portarlington Highway grants easy access to both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
Overlooking the front garden, the lounge creates a calming spot to pop up your feet and relax. The light-filled open plan living/dining/kitchen zone flows onto the north-facing alfresco, which puts the foundations in place for casual outdoor living. The kitchen features a built-in pantry and stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, oven, gas hob, and canopy rangehood. The generous island bench conveniently doubles as a breakfast bar.
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom is complete with a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry. The 4th bedroom offers immense versatility as a home office or kids play space.
You'll be comfortable all year long thanks to ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
The spacious backyard creates a secure play space for children and pets alike. Green thumbs will love that it also provides the ultimate blank canvas to create their dream outdoor oasis.
The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, along with rear vehicle access to the alfresco - making this an ideal choice for those needing to store caravans, boats, or trailers.
Offering easy living in Leopold, you'll need to act quickly to snap up this terrific home! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Endless Potential
Set on a large corner allotment of 636m2 approx. this property offers plenty of options (STCA), such as- subdividing the existing home off and either selling the adjoining parcel, building a townhouse to sell or to create a future investment property. Making this property attractive to both owner occupiers & investors alike.
This 3 bedroom double storey home has an extremely flexible floor plan and offers views across the Bay and city. The backyard is a blank canvas, currently a very low maintenance yard, whilst offering a 6mx4m (approx.) shed with separate toilet.
The upstairs level comprises 2 bedrooms with built in robes and central bathroom. The large open living and dining area adjoins the kitchen which makes for an easy living lifestyle.
Downstairs includes a 3rd bedroom with ensuite and kitchenette area making it perfect for use as a guest suit or teenage retreat. A carport conversion provides plenty of storage space.
With so much to offer the property truly is a must to inspect in order to understand its full potential.
An ideal location with primary school, the Leopold Community Hub and recreation facilities close by. With some of the Bellarine Peninsulas finest wineries and beaches within a short drive this home is sure to please.

Description:
Your Oasis Awaits
Conveniently located within walking distance to the ever-expanding Gateway Plaza, Sporting grounds, Leopold Primary School and public transport, this neat near new home offers convenience, functionality, space & low maintenance living.
This property offers the best of both, featuring a spacious interior, offering 3 bedrooms, 2 bathroom and open plan living, while enjoying a low maintenance yard. Positioned on 421m2 (approx.) with a double garage and immaculate/modern street frontage. The combined dining, kitchen and fully carpeted lounge is a perfect open plan design. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, gas stove, oven and rangehood. The main bedroom offers a full ensuite & walk in robe. Remaining bedrooms include built in robes.
Outside, is an ideal under covered entertaining area, perfect for entertaining no matter the weather. Adding to the comfort of the home, gas central heating and reverse cycle split system air conditioner.
This home is ideal for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor alike. With everything at your fingertips, this is one not to be missed.

Description:
EXPRESSIONS OF INTEREST - CLOSING DEC 6TH @ 3PM (Unless sold prior)
Huge block, luxury home, private beach, spectacular views.
Here's a truly rare opportunity to own a unique piece of Clifton Springs' real estate endowed with a massive landscaped garden, an impeccably-presented brick home, a panoramic view of the bay with the You Yangs as a backdrop, and your own absolute beach front. Plus the option to subdivide (current Planning Permit available).
The double block presents a long, tree-lined drive (Golden Elms, Japanese Maple, Manchurian Pear) to the ample parking courtyard and double garage. A paved path flanked by exotic garden beds leads to the impressive front portico, with leadlight windows surrounding the front door. Once inside, you're naturally drawn, via a welcoming lounge, to the breathtaking view of the bay - which is on display across the whole of the north-facing, open-plan living area.
A decorative fernery with its own watering system is a special feature at the eastern end of the room, and an intimate dining alcove sits in a central bay-window - taking in the superb coastal vista. The generous kitchen has a return bench with a 40mm Caesarstone top, an Electrolux wall oven, grill, and induction cooktop, an Asko dishwasher, and a walk-in pantry. A second lounge/entertainment area opens to the covered front terrace which is equipped with automatically retractable see-through blinds and an adjustable louvred roof - just the spot for a relaxed alfresco meal.
The master bedroom has a walk-through robe to a neat ensuite, while two more bedrooms have easy access to a main bathroom and powder room. There's also an office, a well-equipped laundry, an outdoor WC, a practice putting green, and even an entertainment gazebo at the edge of the expansive front lawn. Year-round comfort is provided by electric under-floor heating, split systems and ceiling fans throughout the home. In addition, and in close proximity to the house, is a large storage shed and workshop - big enough to take a boat and trailer, a ride-on mower, and more. Here, a superb lifestyle awaits - or the chance to subdivide and develop.
- Unique luxury home on huge block with spectacular bay views
- Grand open-plan living area with access to covered terrace
- Kitchen with Caesarstone benchtops and Euro-style appliances
- 3 bedrooms, (master with ensuite), bathroom, laundry, office
- Electric underfloor heating, split systems, and ceiling fans
- DLUG, storage shed, option to subdivide (Planning Permit).

Description:
Charming Rustic Delight
If you desire the ultimate coastal lifestyle property; enter this beautifully appointed custom build showcasing one of a kind charm and character. This enviable land holding of 1,171m2 (approx.) is flanked by neighbouring parklands and delivers a truly tranquil setting. A substantial residence boasts grand proportions and it sits effortlessly within the green leafy surrounds. Earthy finishes including polished timber and slate flooring, exposed brick and timber panelled wall features further enhance a warm welcoming feel.
A stunning streetscape of native trees creates an anticipation for what is sure to be a memorable inspection
4 beautifully appointed bedrooms, all complete with built in robes
The primary living zone boasts grand proportions. A trio of feature windows take full advantage of a northerly aspect and promote a wonderfully light and bright feel.
The kitchen serves up a wonderful space with expansive benchtops, gas cooktop and a walk in pantry ensures excellent storage solutions.
A double garage with drive through access and additional off street parking provides room enough for the cars, boat, caravan and even the jet ski
An additional independent studio gives further flexibility to the potential living arrangements; it is powered and could be utilised as a teenage retreat, rumpus or even an arts studio/home office
As impressive as this residence is, it is its tranquillity and life style features that promotes it to one of the finest properties on the market. Landscaped native plantations, towering mature gum trees over to the neighbouring parklands, a chook run, various productive fruit trees, defined brick paved pathways, multiple water tanks and picturesque courtyards to take in an early morning coffee or a late glass of red from one of the award winning local wineries.
Beautifully positioned within the golden triangle with the water's edge only a short stroll away, the convenience of the Pinaroo Ave strip shopping, the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp literally just down the road and walking distance to local schools, kindergarten and day-care centre
All the modern comforts and a impressive inclusions list to be discovered on further inspection. A true opportunity to secure what can only be described as top shelf real estate

Description:
Great location, development potential
Located within 400m of the Gateway plaza and set on a 627m2 corner allotment. Offering potential for a smart subdivision or take advantage of the generous rear garden ideal for the home buyer. Comprising three generous bedrooms open plan kitchen and living area, central bathroom and paved outdoor area.
Add to this its location to schools, transport, parkland and the Bellarine Peninsula. First home buyers, investors and developers should put this property at the top of their list
For more information on this property text '1 Warrawee' to 0428 444 841

Description:
Eureka!!
Just when you thought it had become the impossible dream! Enter this beautifully presented 3 bedroom 'home'; charming full renovation, character filled and boasting bay views for under $500,000! Eureka!!!
The primary living zone is a beautifully appointed open plan design; a Coonara creates a warm welcoming feel and a glass sliding door provides a seamless connection to the decked alfresco (boasting bay views and frames the granite peaks of the You Yangs).
3 generous bedrooms are light filled; the 3rd bedroom is currently a beauty salon and with its independent access is ideal for a home office/business.
The kitchen is character filled; expansive benchtops, excellent storage solutions, feature tile splashback and 900mm stainless steel gas cooktop.
A simply stunning renovation of the main bathroom will certainly turn heads; floor to ceiling tiles, custom vanity and luxurious shower.
A rustic inspired garden is truly tranquil; established trees, a fish pond, productive fruit trees and fairy lights create a wonderful peaceful garden setting. A custom studio finished with recycled timber and expansive windows sits effortlessly in its surrounds.
All the modern comforts and many more inclusions to be discovered upon inspection which definitely won't disappoint!!

Description:
A Rare Beauty, One of a Kind
An exceptional example of award-winning Porter Davis design; this home being 1 of only 3 "DRYSDALE LOFT" design with the added loft and being the ONLY one of its calibre with this façade, truly a rare find!
A seamless fusion of character with a contemporary edge, light filled, airy and open with an astute footprint that certainly has family practicality front of mind.
What sets this home apart from many others is certainly the free-flowing floor plan which includes 5 bedrooms, study, 3 living areas plus a purpose-built multimedia theatre room. Complimenting this family pleaser is a fantastic grand alfresco plus a decent grassed yard for the children to play. Located moments from ALL major amenities, public transport including main pick up/drop off points for schools; situated in a cul-de-sac style location opposite a beautiful reserve with a cut through to the nearest park. You are buying into the best of what Leopold has to offer not to mention being a short distance in both directions to Geelong City and the best of what the Bellarine has to offer.
The unique façade is different to what you would normally expect in an estate and rather deceiving from the front, with charming street appeal and an established garden you will feel compelled to know what is beyond the special stained-glass doors. Upon entry you are greeted with spotted gum floating floors that run throughout the home with a welcoming wide entry and high ceilings, the recesses and bulk heads that appear throughout the home continuously implement a point of difference. The fore of the home hosts a very generous 4.1 x 4.4 master suite with oversized walk-in robe and a lavish full ensuite including floor to ceiling tiles, double stone vanity, seamlessly tiled walk-in shower with shower niche, lots of storage and separate toilet. Internal access into the garage; a study and 5th bedroom with BIR's complete the first part of this home. The highlight is the open plan kitchen, meals and dining with access onto the expansive Spotted Gum decked alfresco area. The loft ceiling complimented with an array of windows gives this area a sense calm, light filled and airy year-round. The designer kitchen will excite any avid chef with stone benchtops, in trend tiled splash back, huge walk-in pantry, 900mm gas oven/cooktop, in bench power points and connections to plumb your fridge in, dishwasher complete with custom over bench pendants.
Room to home a large dining table without encroaching onto the living room makes entertaining a breeze, the boutique sliding panels that open onto the alfresco blends inside to out perfectly.
The children's wing is zoned with a separate rumpus area, also with sliding access onto the alfresco, main bathroom carrying through the same lavish finishes as the ensuite including deep freestanding bath tub, separate toilet, 3 bedrooms all equipped with BIR's and large laundry room with built-in tough, large linen press and access to the yard. The stairs are neatly tucked away and out of sight and will lead you to a very impressive games hall which hosts the most amazing sunsets AND, for the movie buffs, you can't go past the well-thought-out purpose-built cinema room. Dolby Atmos 7.2.4 Audio-Visual cinema room with projector and screen, in ceiling speakers, all wiring in place for sound system of your choice (current equipment in place negotiable) equipped with sound stop plaster and sound check acoustic absorbing insulation in walls, strategically placed acoustic tiles, custom theatre curtain complete with WiFi controllable split system heating and cooling.
The front yard is established and manicured tying in with the façade of the home whilst in the back yard you will find fruit trees, plants and shrubs with lots of room to expand and add your own touch.
This home has an abundance of storage which is needed and fitting for a home of this size, other features include data points and CAT 6 network cabling throughout the home ensuring significantly faster network speeds, in wall/ceiling speakers, natural gas point fitted for BBQ area, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, internal doors to match the high ceilings, mirror included in BIR's, 6KW solar panels, water tank servicing toilets, double lock up garage with rear roller door access complete with quality fittings and fixtures throughout.
This home is certainly a rare find with location, parcel size, floor plan and quality creating the ideal package and reflecting value for money in the area.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Prime Bayside Living
Location does not get any better than this! Situated only a stone's throw to the water's edge, this is your chance to secure a piece of the sought-after Bellarine pie! With room to improve and add your own touches, this home offers itself in a multitude of ways.
The established and private front garden is low maintenance and offers a tranquil entrance to the home. Upon entry, you're greeted by a spacious open plan living area with sublime garden views and split system for year-round comfort, which effortlessly flows into the dining and kitchen space. The kitchen is fully equipped with gas cooktop, electric oven, stainless steel dishwasher, ample storage and breakfast bench. The rear of the ground level hosts 3 bedrooms, all with built-in-robes, which are serviced by the renovated central bathroom with shower, bath and vanity, separate toilet and large laundry with an abundance of storage.
Float upstairs to the top level and you will be truly in awe! A large open second living area encapsulates the stunning Bay views that are on offer, while also being equipped with a cozy wood fire and sliding door access to the wrap around balcony. Enjoying that morning coffee, evening wine or entertaining while overlooking the Bay has never looked so good! The master retreat also sits on the top level and offers a walk-in-robe and fully equipped ensuite. The flexible floorplan offers itself for the growing family, those who are wanting to enjoy the relaxed Bay lifestyle or would make for a savvy holiday home.
Sliding door access from the kitchen welcomes you to the undercover outdoor entertaining area and a large, lush open grass space. Situated upon a sizeable 585m2 block, one of the biggest draw cards to this home is the large driveway which leads you to the sizeable SLUG. With ample room for multiple cars, boats, caravans and all toys that the Bay lifestyle offers - There is room for all!
With the Bay, boat ramp, the Dell and Golf Course only a short stroll away, while all major amenities, supermarkets, schools, public transport at your fingertips, the lifestyle is here and waiting for you - The only thing left to do is to make your move!

Description:
Breathtaking Views
Showcasing panoramic bay views this solid built residence of epic proportions presents a wonderful opportunity for a savvy prospective purchaser! 4 bedrooms, expansive dual living zones, eye catching pool/spa setting and an oversized garage/workshop ensure this property is without a doubt one with the lot.
4 bedrooms; master complete with ensuite and walk in robe
The primary living zone is oversized by any measure and provides a wonderful orientation to capture the sweeping panoramic water views with the glass sliding door creating a seamless connection to a decked alfresco
The quality built timber kitchen serves up a wonderfully practical space with expansive bench tops, custom cabinetry, 900mm gas cook top and a walk in pantry
A 2nd independent living zone creates further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
The garage/workshop is simply a handy man or woman's dream. The oversized double garage 7.4x8.1m (approx.) is complemented by a further area dedicated for a workshop (fully powered)
A lovely pool setting; an expansive timber deck and flanked by mature trees to create a truly private setting. A spa is sheltered by a cabana completing the ultimate entertainers' property
A wonderful home for today and the ideal property profile for someone looking to value add for a flip prospect

Description:
Prized Location, Premium Opportunity!
Enviably situated moments from the Drysdale Shopping Precinct, 2/38-40 Princess Street presents itself with all the hallmarks of what living in Central Drysdale has to offer.
Set securely back from the street, as one of only five townhouses, the opportunity for the astute investor or downsizer is not to be overlooked. Upon entering, you are greeted with superbly proportioned open plan living and dining rooms that feature vaulted 4.6m high ceilings, that gives this home a well-designed, spacious feel.
Featuring a stylish refurbished kitchen with a large pantry that overlooks the neat and compact courtyard area, two spacious bedrooms with built in robes and a centrally located bathroom, keen buyers will delight in this opportunity and see the home for its full potential.
The property is currently tenanted with a rental return of $315pw and a Residential Tenancy Agreement is in place until 20/01/2020. The additional bonus to this home is that you are within easy walking distance to all that central Drysdale has to offer.
With its vast array of quality shops and cafes, access to bus services, moments to all the world class wineries and restaurants that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, 2/38-40 Princess Street is a definite property to be put on your short list.

Description:
Dream Investment or First Home
Look no further! If you are looking to invest in the property market or a first home buyer wanting to get into the market.
Currently leased till November at $335 per week. For first home buyers a longer settlement is required to secure now.
Perfectly located in a quiet court and minutes away from the Leopold Primary School, Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre and easy to the Bellarine Rail Trail.
Situated on 573m2 allotment comprising of 3 good sized Bedrooms, main & 2nd with walk in robes and easy access to the two way bathroom.
The centrally located modern Kitchen offers a great size pantry, gas hot plates, updated electric wall oven and griller. The floor plan is versatile and offers two separate living areas consisting of large Lounge and the Kitchen/Meals/Family area has practical and modern hard wearing tiles.
Ducted gas heating is provided for those chilly winter nights and a reverse cycle air conditioner is just the thing for controlling the heat in the summer months.
A large double carport is provided with seamless entry to house. The spacious yard has a garden shed and is low maintenance.
This is a very neat and tidy property and with a current tenant in place makes this a "Dream Investment". Leopold's current rental vacancy rate is 0.67%. Sit back and reap the benefits for years to come.

Occupying just over 2000m2, this neat 3 bedroom home comes with a huge 10 x 20 m2 shed and 10 solar panels. Perfect for the Tradie or home business. The large parcel of land has room to extend and or install a pool (STCA), not to mention space for storing your caravan, boat or trailer. Extra shedding and workshop are also a bonus.The nearby Bellarine Highway places a selection of shops right at your fingertips, while Moolap Primary School & Newcomb Secondary College are close by for families.

Description:
EXPRESSIONS OF INTEREST - Closing 28th Oct @ 4pm (unless sold prior)
Fantastic lifestyle opportunity on five fabulous acres (approx.)
This is picture-postcard stuff. A comfortable and well-presented north-facing home, surrounded by attractive established gardens, and positioned at the top of a gently sloping hill that reaches down to a meandering stream at the bottom, which is flanked by magnificent mature poplars and weeping willows.
With an entry off Lings Road, the driveway passes fruit trees, soaring native eucalypts and even a small vineyard, before arriving at the rear of the homestead. Here there are numerous storage sheds, an expansive vegetable garden, and a great kid's playground complete with a jungle gym.
The home itself offers a covered rear deck with entry to the kitchen, a delightful dining area and huge lounge - both opening onto the elevated terrace that enjoys sunshine and an outstanding view over the property. There are four bedrooms (master with ensuite), a main bathroom and a laundry. A slow-combustion wood stove and numerous ceiling fans provide seasonal comfort.
Custom built 8x12 shed with concrete floor, optioned with enlarged entry door allowing taller/larger access, ideal for workshop, boat or caravan storage.
Life here is relaxed and unhurried, typical of the wonderful rural atmosphere of Wallington. Ocean Grove is just a five-minute drive away, with easy access to other Bellarine Peninsula townships, Geelong and the Surf Coast.
- Five-acre (approx.) property with established homestead and gardens
- Dining and lounge open to north-facing terrace and views
- Kitchen, four bedrooms, two bathrooms, and laundry
- Assorted storage sheds, vegetable garden, kids' playground
- Sloping block to creek with numerous native and fruit trees
- Short drive to Ocean Grove, easy access to the Bellarine.

Description:
QUIET COURT LOCATION WITH PLENTY OF SPACE ON OFFER
Well maintained family residence positioned in a lovely quiet court. On entry an impressive hallway immediately leads you to the sunken lounge with soaring ceilings and open fire place adjoining the formal dining area. Pine kitchen is well organised with dishwasher and a sense of open plan with an abundance of space for informal dining and family area with slate tiling and split system to cater for your all round comfort. Three bedrooms, the master having a lovely ensuite and the central bathroom servicing the remaining bedrooms with separate shower and spa bath. Externally the gardens are low maintenance and well maintained, single carport plus remote lock up garage. Water views are on offer from garden seated area and this well positioned home in a family friendly court will be highly sought by first home buyers or purchasers wanting extra space.

Description:
A hidden Sanctuary in Leopold
Ideally located close to the Portarlington Rd and schools this lovely 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with drive through double carport has everything you will need and more. Beautifully prepared it has fresh carpeting throughout. Sitting on a generous 650m2 and hidden behind a modern façade this home is full of surprises! Comprising a neat entry behind a gate with the carport/garage to the right which has a roller door access to the back yard. The layout has an office/4th bedroom adjacent to the entrance foyer and the master bedroom with WIR and ensuite at the front of the home. Beyond the entrance is a formal lounge and dining. Moving further into the home is a large open plan kitchen, dining and lounge. The remaining 2 bedrooms are located towards the rear of the home and feature BIRs and are serviced by a central bathroom. Outside is a fantastic undercover alfresco, low maintenance garden, lawn area with garden shed. The property backs onto the Bellarine Rail trail, ideal for bike rides and walks. This really is a fantastic property ready to go. With all this one has to offer it won't last so be quick to inspect.
650m2 block
Reverse Cycle Air-conditioning
Backs onto Bellarine Rail trail.
Stratco Pergola
Fresh carpeting throughout
Floating timber floors

Description:
Family Abode With Gorgeous Backyard!
Set in a peaceful court, this property offers easy family living over approx. 657m2! The gardens and spacious backyard will delight, while the sheltered alfresco sets the scene for casual outdoor living!
With the Rebecca Reserve playground and Bellarine Rail Trail just a short stroll from your front door, youll always be inspired to venture outdoors for some fresh air. Young families will be in their element with the Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub, and Leopold Library all within easy walking distance. Public transport is conveniently close by, along with the expansive Gateway Plaza and Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds.
The tidy interiors grant you the option to move straight in or to rejuvenate with a contemporary touch (STCA). Featuring two bay windows, the L-shaped living/dining zone welcomes in an abundance of natural light. The kitchen is equipped with a built-in pantry, stainless steel oven, and electric cooktop. A second living zone flows onto the sheltered alfresco, which creates a tranquil setting for outdoor living. Draped with Wisteria, this generous outdoor zone will become your favourite spot to relax on a lazy weekend or to entertain family and friends!
The Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite, which is complete with a shower, single vanity, and toilet. Two additional bedrooms boast built-in robes, while the study offers versatility as a 4th bedroom. The main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry with storage complete the floorplan. A gas wall heater and air conditioner provide comfort.
Surrounded by gorgeous gardens, the spacious backyard feels like your very own private oasis. Youll love watching the kids play as you listen to the serene sounds of the water feature, while the fire pit sets the scene for fun nights under the stars. The veggie garden promotes sustainable living, while the garden shed and storage area put the practical elements in place. The double carport provides off-street parking, along with the driveway that accommodates three additional vehicles. With the foundations in place for beautiful family living, youll need to act swiftly to secure this Leopold gem! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
An entertainers delight with stylish finishes!
A lifestyle of luxury awaits you in this contemporary home, offering an inviting single level design with four spacious bedrooms, two living spaces and a spectacular outdoor entertaining area. In a desirable location 2km to Leopold shopping complex, short drive to the Bellarine Peninsula, and 10 mins to Geelong CBD. All you need to do is move in and enjoy!
Kitchen Island bench, subway tile splashback, 900mm gas cooktop, oven & rangehood, stone benchtops, overhead wine storage, walk in pantry, feature track lighting & down lights, stainless steel appliances
Living open plan adjoining living, kitchen & dining, timber laminate flooring, split system air con, glass sliding doors open to outdoor alfresco deck, well lit with natural light
Second living secluded home theatre set up, carpeted, wooden feature wine rack, down lights, ducted heating
Master bedroom ceiling fan, carpeted, down lights, roller blinds, walk in robe, ensuite with fully tiled shower, large vanity & toilet
Minor bedrooms carpeted, ceiling fans, roller blinds, window curtains in third bedroom/nursey room, BIRs
Main bathroom large vanity, deep bath, shower & separate toilet
Outdoor undercover alfresco deck with downlights & ceiling fans, outdoor built in BBQ & wine fridge, wall mounted television, exterior roller blinds, very large backyard, garden shed and side access
Mod cons ducted heating throughout, ceiling fans throughout all bedrooms, laundry with side house access, double lock up garage with external and side of house access
Ideal for: social families, First Home Buyers, families, downsizers and investors
Close by local facilities: Leopold Shopping Centre, Bunnings, Child Care Centre, sporting ovals, local walking trails & playgrounds.
